## DownloadableWishlistItem interface

A downloadable product wish list item

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DownloadableWishlistItem extends WishlistItemInterface 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [WishlistItemInterface](./magento-api.wishlistiteminterface.md)
